question_stem:
Let E, F and G be three events from a sample space. Match the following descriptions to the events regarding E, F and G below. There is only one matching description for each event.
_____________    1      (E U F U G)c
_____________    2      EF U EG U FG
1. 5
2. 2
question_stem_html:
Let E, F and G be three events from a sample space. Match the following descriptions to the events regarding E, F and G below. There is only one matching description for each event.

_____________ 1 (E U F U G)c

_____________ 2 EF U EG U FG

1. 5

2. 2
